Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are. This is <RED>Echo Village</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The letter from your folks was quite
detailed, actually.
<PAGE>
To celebrate your coming of age, you've
taken over the farmland that your
ancestors owned up here, right?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That land was originally going to be
taken on by your father to operate a
farm.
<PAGE>
But he ended up moving to another town
in order to marry your mother, and so it
remained in your family, but unused.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
He still came into town every now and
then to do some basic work on it,
rather than completely giving it up.
<PAGE>
He loved this land very much.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So he said he was very happy now that
you are going to be living here.
<PAGE>
He also asked me to give you all the
help that I can.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll happily do whatever your parents
ask of me. I do have my own things to
deal with, of course...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We'll get to that eventually, anyway.
First I want to thank you for saving me
by treating you to a meal!
<PAGE>
It must have been tough getting out
here. Come to my house and rest up a
little. Let's go.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is my house. If you need anything
you can come here and see me. I'll do
whatever is within my power.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
While we eat I'll explain to you about
<RED>health</RED> and <RED>condition</RED>. Let's go inside.
